tred_extension.title: Bridging Anaphora and Textual Coreference Annotation
tred_extension.copyright: Jiří Mírovský, Petr Pajas, Mirek Týnovský, Zdeněk Žabokrtský
tred_extension.description: Provides an annotation mode for the annotation of the bridging anaphora and the extended textual coreference in PDT.
